title: LIVIN TO DIE: a gangsta romance story
description: In life, there's so much to die for and so much more to live for, but in both cases, death is the conclusion to living. Some people are willing to die for love, money, or even respect.Caught up in a lifestyle that often ends with a lengthy prison sentence or a brutal murder, one man will come to find out exactly what he's willing to die or live for.LIVIN TO DIE takes you through the mind of visionary as he embarks on journey to wealth, power and ultimately to find himself. On his road he leaves a trail of blood, broken promises and broken homes.
author: Garvin Alcock
